name: Dont Stop
description:
You dont want to fall down.

Keep moving but the platforms might become walls.

This is a 3D First person platformer with parkour elements, you can double jump, wallrun and duck to avoid danger.

KNOWN BUGS:

Pressing W and LShift can cause a rapid burst of speed forwards.

When restarting a level the game thinks the pause menu is still open, press Esc and click the mouse once to fix.

Pause menu can be buggy to open, just keep pressing Esc to open it

You can get stuck on the Green Boxes if you dont jump quick enough.

Game music loops forever.

Lighting tends to flicker.
